inclusion.criterion: listed for implantation of micro-invasive glaucoma surgical devices
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Advanced glaucoma (as defined as cup-disc ratio ≥ 0.9 and/or a visual field defect within central 10˚ of fixation)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: diagnosis of glaucoma other than POAG and PACG
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a history of acromegaly due to pituitary adenoma, but there is no mention of advanced glaucoma or diagnosis of glaucoma other than POAG and PACG. He underwent transsphenoidal surgery 4 months ago and takes only vitamin D and multivitamins.
